Class GoSpace

java.lang.Object
  Space
      GoSpace

public class GoSpace
extends Space

This class creates a Go space which is the first space on the GameBoard.

Version:
May 23, 2015
Author:
William Wang, Aditya Kotak, Rahul Sarathy., Period: 6, Assignment: MonopolyGame, Sources: none

Constructor Summary

          This constructs the Go space on the GameBoard.
 
Method Summary
 void act(Player p, javax.swing.JTextArea text)
          This method prints out when a player is on this go space.

Method Detail

act

public void act(Player p,
                javax.swing.JTextArea text)
